message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking to save a bit on the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $160. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $150?
I'm close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $155, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. What do you think?
I understand you're close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $145?
